revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Magic Ball |image = [[File:Bag_Magic_Ball_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Magic Ball''. |dex = 20 |effect = Gives a bonus to your catch rate }} The '''Magic Ball''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it gives a bonus to the player's catch rate. ==Details== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || +5% to catchrate || 250 captured Pokémon || 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || +6% to catchrate || 250 captured Pokémon || 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || +7% to catchrate || 750 captured Pokémon || 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || +8% to catchrate || 1250 captured Pokémon || 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || +9% to catchrate || 2500 Captured Pokémon || 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || +10% to catchrate || N/A || N/A |- |} == Trivia == * The artwork of the Magic Ball shares its design with the Premier Ball from the official games.
{{Oak items}}
[[Category:Oak Items]] [[Category:Items]]
